cont.entity_a: Basic UVC camera with 800 x 600 resolution.
No software installation needed. Installation requires Microsoft software, which is large and takes time to install. Software installation requires Internet Explorer as the default browser.
cont.entity_b: Software enhances picture in low light and cancels sound loops.

cont.entity_a: Features a sliding cover to protect the lens. Conveniently attaches to laptop screens and is compact with a protective case. Compact design with a retractable lens for protection. Does not fit all laptop screens due to design.
cont.entity_b: Versatile design but clip may not fit all laptop screens. Strong clip but may not fit all laptop models.

cont.entity_a: Decent video quality, better than older models, if bandwidth permits. Good electronic adjustments for Zoom, Brightness, Contrast, Hue, Gamma, and Low Light. Good in low light and easy to configure. High quality images and video for the price.
cont.entity_b: High-quality video in low light. Good picture quality with effective low light filter.
Compact and portable with carrying pouch.

cont.entity_a: Recognized in Windows 7 and Vista without problems. Installation on some laptops can be problematic due to software issues.
cont.entity_b: Plug-and-play setup. Installation issues on Windows Vista for some users.

cont.entity_a: Not compatible with all social media platforms; works well with MSN Live Messenger. Some compatibility issues with Skype and other IM applications. Works well with SightSpeed and other communication software. Known issue with antennas causing static; Microsoft offers refunds.
cont.entity_b: Some compatibility issues with AIM but works well with MSN Messenger. Compatible with multiple operating systems, including Ubuntu Linux.

cont.entity_a: Mic quality is not the best.
cont.entity_b: Built-in microphone and speaker improve usability.

cont.entity_a: Manual tilt feature allows for picture adjustment. Manual focus needed, not good for distances beyond 4 feet. Manual adjustments needed for best image quality.
cont.entity_b: Manual focus required for clear images. Manual focus can be tricky initially. Manual focus allows for close-up imaging.

Price.comm: Affordable with good picture quality for the price.

cont.entity_a: Interference issues with laptop antennas causing audio static. Some users experience instability with Skype on Vista. Some users report overheating issues. Some users report poor performance with older USB ports.
cont.entity_b: Mounting clamp is insufficient for wider desktop monitors. Some users experience software-related computer crashes. Face tracking is not very effective. Some users report software slowing down computers. Some users experience issues with mounting on thin laptop screens.

cont.entity_a: Good webcam for basic use but not recommended for high-quality needs.
cont.entity_b: Good for basic video calls but not high-resolution needs. Good for casual use but not recommended for professional quality.
